title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - The Evolution of AWS Skills Validation (TNC106)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS 技能验证的演进 (TNC106)
abstract: Discover how AWS is transforming the way we validate cloud computing skills. As organizations seek professionals who can demonstrate practical abilities alongside theoretical knowledge, AWS is evolving its approach to skills validation. Join us to learn how these changes will benefit both hiring managers and cloud practitioners in proving real-world capabilities.
abstract_cn: 了解AWS如何改变我们验证云计算技能的方式。随着组织寻求能够展示实践能力和理论知识的专业人员,AWS正在不断发展其技能验证方法。加入我们,了解这些变化将如何使招聘经理和云从业者在证明实际能力方面受益。
